data.message:
Bombing everyday in Syria and nobody bats an eye.... Bombed in Paris and everybody losses their minds
#PrayForSyria

replies.message:
It's sad because France is a civilized country.

And also EU is doing their best to receive Syrian refugees whilst ignoring the wishes of some members who oppose it
because Syria is country in war but France is not, I know it must be hard to live there but this is completely different...

Yeah I know that French people are good but French government not...... They are supporting terrorist in Syria since 4 years ..... Weapons , training, political support
Syria was peaceful country as well
Dude what are you saying.
Of course it's Americas fault and France's fault... This coming from someone who has every letter in the alphabet in their name gtfo, and sometimes people need to really see the big picture

والعراق ! 
يوميا اقل شي 5 انفجارات ببغداد وبقية المحافظات 
من غير داعش والعبوات الناسفة والاغتيالات !
If you couldn't sense my sarcasm I'm sorry

Berennan
Because they are human like you.... Because they are father-mother-brothers-sisters Because they are families..... U just need to be a human being to feel sad for them
Exactly my thoughts. .
Amen syria💙

Bombing Isis every day. Kill civilians on a western civilized country and the savages still play the victim card and pray for *muslim country which never was stable* while they are in the joy of the western.
Syria was stable country and very peaceful until 2011.....
Bashar, religion is killing Syria and you're right, nobody bats an eye like they should.
casue france suffer casue of you Syria.... You have ISIS... not us

France is banning the Hijab in it's streets. Any country who prevent people from their own and personal beliefs and desires is uncivilized, its actually stupid, thats not freedom, Hijab doesn't have anything to do with terrorist attacks, this rule was set out of anger. And dont link Terrorists to Muslims, because Terrorism HAS no religion or even an ethnicity!
Isis was a creation of the USA btw
After in some european schools, non muslim kids became a minority, and muslim kids bully girls without hijab (IN EUROPE), I can understand why banning it became an option.
Are u just talking out of air to prove a point? Give me facts please. My fact is, Muslim kids bully Muslim girls? Tickle me with a knife please.

So many reactionary morons.
So little time.
The USA can't even ban it's citizens wielding automatic weapons and kill more annually with firearms offences than you'll see in France.
Israel slaughter Palestinians on a daily basis and are they called Jewish extremists?
USA go chasing invisible weapons under a banner of "war on terror" and slaughter hundreds of thousands of innocent civilians but they are Muslims so that's okay.Do the math people.
This has nothing to do with religion but rather more to do with mankind's self gratification for a need of violence.
All Muslims are terrorists?
All idiots think so.
True words...
See the difference!? Everyday vs a one time occurrence???
True...
Tell me, why should I pray for a country that hates my country?
Stfu

Just want you to know that I am aware of everything going on in Syria and it breaks my heart. I read all about the refugees stuggling to cross borders or simply stay alive.. But please dont diminish the suffering of other countries just because yours isn't "public."  I am sorry the media doesn't cover your people enough but we need to stand together instead of being torn apart. We have but little time left on this earth.
